Bus-Transportation-Management-System-main.models.bus_route_model module

Author: Samiul Ahamed Fhyas

class models.bus_route_model.BusRouteModel[source]

Bases: object

Data access for bus routes and list of buses.

static get_all_routes() → List[Dict][source]

Get all bus routes from the database.

Returns:

List of all bus route records.

Return type:

List[Dict]

static all_enriched_routes() → List[Dict][source]

Get all routes with enriched data including bus_type, operator, rating, fare, etc.

Returns:

List of route dictionaries with enriched fields.

Return type:

List[Dict]

static distinct_stations_and_operators() → Dict[str, List[str]][source]

Get distinct stations and operators from all routes.

Returns:

Dictionary with ‘stations’ and ‘operators’ keys,

each containing a sorted list of unique values.

Return type:

Dict[str, List[str]]

static search_routes(src: str, dst: str, departure_date: str | None = None, bus_type: str | None = None, operator: str | None = None, price_min: float | None = None, price_max: float | None = None, sort_by: str | None = None) → List[Dict][source]

Search routes by simple matching on route field formatted as “Src-Dst”. Since the schema lacks fare/type, we enrich rows on the fly.

static suggest_alternatives(src: str, dst: str) → List[Dict][source]

Suggest alternative routes when no exact match is found.

Parameters:

  • src (str) – Source location.

  • dst (str) – Destination location.

Returns:

List of up to 10 suggested routes that share source or destination.

Return type:

List[Dict]

static get_route_by_id(route_id: int) → Dict | None[source]

Get a bus route by its ID.

Parameters:

route_id (int) – The ID of the route to retrieve.

Returns:

Route dictionary if found, None otherwise.

Return type:

Optional[Dict]
